function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in sewage and its correlation with reported COVID-19 cases.","Impact":"Potential underestimation of COVID-19 prevalence and risk of environmental contamination.","Mitigation":"Implement regular monitoring of sewage for early detection, and improve sewage treatment systems to reduce environmental contamination.","Technologies":"qRT-PCR for sewage monitoring, advanced sewage treatment systems.","People":"Public in areas served by the WWTP, urban planners, environmental agencies.","Owner":"Public health authorities, environmental agencies, sewage treatment facilities."}]}
